attributes.action:
Make the Monday following Remembrance Sunday 
A national bank holiday
attributes.additional_details:
During both world wars the people of the United Kingdom and its commonwealth citizens gave up so much for our future 
It is only right that we as a United Kingdom can be allowed to celebrate the sacrifices people made during both world wars
attributes.background:
I ask government to consider making the Monday following Remembrance Sunday a bank holiday
Additionally to this I implore government to consider altering trading hours to make opening any shop regardless of size illegal 
So everyone can celebrate without fear of being called in to work it
